item.title: JINA - Build cross-modal and multi-modal applications on the cloud
item.description:
Jina is a MLOps framework that empowers anyone to build cross-modal and multi-modal applications on the cloud. It uplifts a PoC into a production-ready service. Jina handles the infrastructure complexity, making advanced solution engineering and cloud-native technologies accessible to every developer.

Link

item.title: Native EKS Ingress: AWS Load Balancer Controller & 5 Examples (Terraform, TLS, IngressGroup, IP)
item.description:
AWS Load Balancer Controller is a controller to help manage Elastic Load Balancers for a Kubernetes cluster.

item.title: Top ten cloud GPU platforms for deep learning
item.description:
In this article, we explore the services of available cloud GPU platforms with a focus on relevant factors such as pricing, infrastructure, design, performance, support, and security. We use this to present the best platforms to consider for your cloud GPU necessities.

Link

item.title: HashiCorp Terraform Associate Certification Course - Pass the Exam!
item.description:
Prepare for the HashiCorp Terraform Associate Certification and pass! The Terraform Associate certification is for Cloud Engineers specializing in operations, IT, or development who know the basic concepts and skills associated with open source HashiCorp Terraform.

Link

item.title: Developing and Deploying a Machine Learning Model on Vertex AI using Python
item.description:
Write ML Pipelines that will make your MLOps team happy: follow a clean separation of responsibility between model code and ops code. This article show you how to do that.

Link
